abstract: Rival gangs team up in Baltimore to protect businesses and residents even as looting continues, while peaceful demonstrators hold moment of silence to commemorate Freddie Gray, who died week after suffering a major spinal cord injury while in police custody.
lead_paragraph: Young men pulled cases of water from a looted convenience store while peaceful protesters from 300 Men March, a local anti-violence group, tried to persuade women and children to go back inside.

headline.main: Amid Violence, Factions and Messages Converge in a Weary and Unsettled Baltimore
headline.print_headline: Amid Violence, Factions and Messages Converge in a Weary and Unsettled City

snippet: Young men pulled cases of water from a looted convenience store while peaceful protesters from 300 Men March, a local anti-violence group, tried to persuade women and children to go back inside.
